Introduction

Hey guys...
Name's Ankan Bal
B.Tech Computer Science graduate
A die hard Video Games fan and enthusiast. Also a hardcore IoT enthusiast
NieR:Automata and Devil May Cry lover(those are video games actually ðŸ˜…)
And a self-taught anime/manga fanart artist
I am interested in game design, AR/VR (particularly AR), Full stack development, AI/ML, IoT(love playing with the modules) and data processing. IoT assembling is something that I do even for fun too like playing with all kinds of different modules to create something different everytime be it on Arduino or Raspi3. But my passion runs for game design and development and solving problems through programming but mostly I do it on python. I intend to start my own research in that field too. I play and learn about creating video games and read about cosmology as hobbies. I am always searching for opportunities to learn new things be it anything ( even cooking). I love learning new languages. As for foreign languages, I started with Japanese due to my love for that place and I plan to start learning other languages as well.
Hit me up in DM or mail me at 2016csb1031@iitrpr.ac.in ( or ankanb49@gmail.com ) .....would love to talk and get connected to more and more people across the professional world.
